short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate English text on webpages to Urdu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing UrduSphere, your ultimate Chrome extension for seamless webpage translation. With UrduSphere at your fingertips, you can effortlessly convert any English webpage into Urdu or any other language of your preference. Say goodbye to language barriers as you explore the vast expanse of the internet in your native tongue or the language you're most comfortable with.

Navigate through online articles, news updates, blog posts, and more with ease, as UrduSphere ensures a smooth transition from English to Urdu, opening up a world of information and content tailored to your linguistic needs.

Whether you're a native Urdu speaker, a language enthusiast, or simply looking to broaden your horizons, UrduSphere empowers you to access web content in the language that resonates with you the most. Enhance your browsing experience and immerse yourself in a diverse array of online resources without the constraints of language barriers.

With its user-friendly interface and efficient translation capabilities, UrduSphere seamlessly integrates into your browsing routine, offering convenience and accessibility at your fingertips. Embrace a truly global web experience with UrduSphere, where language is no longer a barrier but a bridge to endless possibilities.
